items.sentence: The woman sitting over there is his present wife.
This stone was so heavy that I could not lift it.
Many young people are out of work in the country.
The sight of the money tempted him into stealing.
Tom told me that I'm the only one that he trusts.
How long does it take to eat a seven-course meal?
Did Tom tell you why he was trying to avoid Mary?
Tom is the one that convinced me to learn French.
My wife's name is Mary and my son's name is John.
I'd really hoped I'd be able to help Tom do that.
